product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
The banner showcases a playful and vibrant toy-themed design centered around a colorful kitty playset positioned at the center. The background features soft green tones with overlapping circular patterns and wave-like shapes to create a whimsical atmosphere. The primary headline, identified by “heading,” is prominently placed at the top in bold uppercase lettering. Directly beneath it is the “subheading” text layer, which provides more context with slightly smaller, clean font styling. The product image layer, labeled “product_image,” is the central visual element depicting the toy. At the bottom, “price” displays the cost in a bold serif font, while a call-to-action button made of “cta_background” and “cta” invites users to shop. The visual hierarchy and clear structure help guide the viewer’s attention effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Mint Green (#bde9c9)
- Deep Forest Green (#28572a)
- Leaf Green (#027223)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Highlight Pink (used in playset image)
- Light Beige (used in toy base)
product_color: The product image showcases a playful and vibrant color palette ideal for children's advertisement banners. Dominant colors include bright pink (#F8539D) for the top playhouse, mint green (#57C9A3) for the grassy platform, and warm tan (#F4C9A1) for the base. Additional accents like sky blue (#4FC3F7), lavender purple (#B68FD8), and leaf green (#00A86B) complement and energize the theme. These colors are harmoniously blended with crisp contrasts such as the pink against green and blue against tan. Each color remains distinct while contributing to an overall inviting and cheerful aesthetic, making the scene visually dynamic and perfect for kids’ marketing.
